projects.Name: Barbarian Streisand Brewery
projects.description: Basically the intersection of Barbra Streisand and beer. A group project to make a beer brewery website. I worked on the 'Book a Tour' page, wrote all copy and assisted with styling
projects.Author(s): Sarah Weatherbee, Matt Gill, Andrew Tiller, Lwam Tekie

projects.Name: Birthday RSVP Tracker
projects.description: Keeps track of friends invited to a birthday party. Uses Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) functionality.

projects.Name: Sandwich maker
projects.description: You could go to Burger King and have it your way, or you could make a sandwich with this trusty little sandwich maker.

projects.Name: Fish Store
projects.description: All the fish. Just for you. Make an order of fish; update and delete order, too.

projects.Name: Squirrely Day Care
projects.description: There's something squirrely about this daycare. The trees are in charge; full-CRUD functionality to schedule, update and delete a hug event.

projects.Name: Music Row: A space erased
projects.description: A full-CRUD single-page application to visualize data of buildings demolished on music row between 2013 and 2018.
